cards.name: Drink 3
cards.description: Take a drink three times.

cards.name: Whore
cards.description: You are the whore. You drink when someone else drinks.

cards.name: Choose 3
cards.description: Choose someone to drink three times.

cards.name: Down your drink
cards.description: Down your drink. You have 60 seconds.

cards.name: Drink
cards.description: Take a drink

cards.name: Choose
cards.description: Choose someone to take a drink

cards.name: Card of death
cards.description: Shotgun a can of drink or take a shot

cards.name: Question master
cards.description: You are the question master. If someone answers a question you ask, they drink.

cards.name: Rule
cards.description: Make up a rule. Everyone must follow this rule. Previous rules are no longer active.

cards.name: Summer
cards.description: If you are born in the summer, take a drink.

cards.name: Distribute 5
cards.description: Distribute five swigs among the players.

cards.name: Drink n times
cards.description: Drink as many times as there are players in this game.

cards.name: Category
cards.description: State a category and players must state things, that belong in this category. The loser must finish their drink.

cards.name: Rhyme
cards.description: Choose a word. Players must say words that rhyme with the chosen word. The loser must finish their drink.

cards.name: Waterfall
cards.description: Everyone starts drinking until the player on their right stops. The player who drew this card can stop at any time.
The player who drew this card drinks once, the player on their right twice, and so on for all players.

cards.name: Story
cards.description: Start a story with one word. Players must repeat the story and add one more word. The loser finishes their drink.

cards.name: Democracy
cards.description: Vote on a player. The player with the most votes must shotgun a beer or take a shot.

cards.name: Coinflip
cards.description: Flip a coin. If heads everyone drinks three times. If tails you drink six times.

cards.name: Half full
cards.description: If your drink is less than half-full, finish it. Otherwise choose someone with less than half-full drink to finish it.

cards.name: Chug master
cards.description: You can at any point make a player finish their drink. Can only be used once.

cards.name: Go back
cards.description: The previous player drinks three times.

cards.name: Thumb master
cards.description: You can at any point put your thumb on the table, and all players must follow. The last player to do this drinks.

cards.name: The unlucky number
cards.description: Players start counting numbers from 1. All numbers containing or divisible by 7 must be skipped. The loser drinks three times.
